Content: Your alerts & radar nearly never loads reliably, and if radar does load, takes quite a while via fiddling with time line control or reloading radar. Doesn't matter what network I'm on, fiber via WiFi, 3g, 4g, 5g.. it's the app. Can't see what the temperature was earlier in the same day, much less further back in time. If it's 2pm, I can't even see what happened at 1pm. Weather underground allows viewing the last 12 hours at least. So far it's the only one that does.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
